adept.name: Adept
adept.desc: (Skill)% for the user to do two consecutive strikes.

aether.name: Aether
aether.desc: (Skill)% chance to do two strikes: One with a Sol effect, and the other with the Luna effect.

astra.name: Astra
astra.desc: (Skill/2)% chance for the user to strike 5 times in a row doing half damage per hit. Each strike can deal a crit or miss.

blessing.name: Blessing
blessing.desc: Allies adjacent to the user restore HP (equal to userâ€™s Magic) at the beginning of the turn.

blossom.name: Blossom
blossom.desc:
User gains less experience (2/3 of the normal amount), but:
Fixed Mode: Only 90 growth points are necessary to gain a stat.
Non-Fixed Mode: If a stat fails to increase, it rolls again for a second chance.

boon.name: Boon
boon.desc: Cures the status effects of all allies adjecent to the user at the start of the turn.

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.desc: (Skill)% chance to block all damage done to the user.

canto.name: Canto
canto.desc: Allows an ally to move again. When transformed, all adjacent allies can move again.

colossus.name: Colossus
colossus.desc: (Skill)% chance to multiply user's strength by 1.25 if user's constitution > enemy's constitution.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.desc: (Skill)% chance to reduce enemy's weapon durability by user's level (+20 if promoted) / 4.

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to return half damage to the enemy when damaged.

daunt.name: Daunt
daunt.desc: Inflicts -5 accuracy/crit to enemies within 3 tiles.

deadeye.name: Deadeye
deadeye.desc: Doubles accuracy. (Skill)% chance to inflict sleep.

flare.name: Flare
flare.desc: (Skill)% chance to halve the enemy's resistance.

gamble.name: Gamble
gamble.desc: Command: User's accuracy is halved and the critical rate is doubled.

guard.name: Guard
guard.desc: (Skill)% chance to prevent the enemy from attacking in combat if user hits.

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.desc: (Crit/2)% chance to kill the foe. Cannot be used against bosses.

lumina.name: Lumina
lumina.desc: User can use light magic. Light's magic rank is the same as the user's staff rank.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc: (Skill)% chance to halve enemy's defense and resistance.

mantle.name: Mantle
mantle.desc: User is immune to all attacks.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc: (Luck)% chance to prevent an attack from killing the user. Instead the user's HP gets reduced to half of the current HP. If the current HP is 1 HP, it does zero damage.

paragon.name: Paragon
paragon.desc: User gains double experience from combat.

parity.name: Parity
parity.desc: Negates both user's and enemy's combat skills, terrain bonuses and support bonuses.

provoke.name: Provoke
provoke.desc: Makes user more likely to be attacked by the enemy.

reinforce.name: Reinforce
reinforce.desc: Command: Summons three yellow units, one Falcon Knight and two Pegasus Knights. Can only be used two times per chapter.

renewal.name: Renewal
renewal.desc: At the beginning of each turn, user recovers HP equal to 1/10 of their max HP.

resolve.name: Resolve
resolve.desc: When user is at half HP or lower, strength, skill and speed are increased by 1.5.

roar.name: Roar
roar.desc: Command: Inflicts paralysis on hit. Can only be used once per chapter. Cannot be used against bosses.

savior.name: Savior
savior.desc: User's stats aren't decreased when carrying an unit.

shade.name: Shade
shade.desc: Makes user less likely to be attacked by the enemy.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: Shove command now push units two tiles away.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: (Skill)% chance to restore HP based on damage dealt to the enemy.

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Command: Steals an unequipped weapon/accessory or an item from the target's inventory if (user's speed > enemy's speed) and (user's strength > item's wt).

stun.name: Stun
stun.desc: (Skill/2)% chance to inflict shock on the target.

reference.Class:
Falcon Knight
Wyvern Lord
Princess Crimea

vortex.name: Vortex
vortex.desc:
Command: Attacks an enemy using Vortex.
For more info, check:
*/fe9 item entry: vortex*

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc: +50 crit when user is at half HP or lower.
